request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /Product

**Description**: Returns ListLookupItems

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/field/products/warehouses

**Method**: GET

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/field/products/warehouses' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json

{
            "id": 50002,
            "table_name": "M_Warehouse",
            "values": {
                "KeyColumn": 50002,
                "DisplayColumn": "Fertilizer",
                "UUID": "705a709d-e054-4ec5-b58a-4bc2158ebbe8"
            },
            "is_active": true
        },
 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /Product

**Description**: Returns ListProductsInfo

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/field/products/table/{table_name}/{column_name}

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params)**

table_name (String, Mandatory)

column_name (String, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/field/products/table/C_RevenueRecognition/C_RevenueRecognition_ID' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
            "id": 50019,
            "uuid": "c7b5c942-032b-490c-9ac8-4931f364bb70",
            "display_value": "",
            "value": "Assembly Area",
            "name": "Assembly Area",
            "upc": "",
            "sku": "",
            "product_category": "Resources",
            "product_group": "",
            "product_class": "",
            "uom": "Hour",
            "list_price": "",
            "standard_price": "",
            "limit_price": "",
            "margin": "",
            "is_stocked": false,
            "available_quantity": "",
            "on_hand_quantity": "",
            "reserved_quantity": "",
            "ordered_quantity": "",
            "unconfirmed_quantity": "",
            "unconfirmed_move_quantity": "",
            "vendor": "",
            "is_instance_attribute": false,
            "description": "",
            "document_note": "",
            "is_active": true
        },

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- the column name does not correspond to any of the records
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Nombre de Columna en BD * No encontrado *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- the table name does not correspond to any of the records
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Tabla * No encontrado *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: GET /Product

**Description**: Returns ListProductsInfo

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/field/products/field/{field_id}

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params)**

field_id (Int32, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash

--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU'

 ```
